            IMPROVEMENT PROJECT,TF056830-PHRD STAFF GRANT PROGRAM - MS.

            IMPROVEMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Kosovo Education
            Participation Improvement Project  were as follows: outcomes
            were moderately satisfactory, the risk to development
            outcome was moderate, the Bank performance was moderately
            satisfactory, and the Borrower performance was moderately
            satisfactory. Some lessons learned included: 1) simple and
            focused project design is appropriate for a post-conflict
            context and accompanying weak capacity of the government; 2)
            community participation is instrumental in rebuilding the
            education system in a post-conflict environment; 3) having a
            local NGO as a facilitation agency is an effective approach
            for school grants and management; and 4) defining the roles
            and responsibility of each stakeholders at the outset is key
            for successful implementation.
